HOME.NAME: Hi, I'm Monica
HOME.DESCRIPTION: As a final-semester student, I have knowledge in programming logic, databases, and frontend development experience, with an interest in UX/UI design. My goal is to contribute to creating intuitive user interfaces and collaborate with multidisciplinary teams in developing innovative solutions.

STUDENT.DESCRIPTION: I have worked on several school projects where I gained experience using modern technologies. During these projects, I developed logical and communication skills, utilized Agile/Scrum methodologies, and worked on frontend development, databases, and interface design.

KAMI_TRAINER.DESCRIPTION: Maintenance, code refactoring, and development of new features for the main web application of Kami Electronics, using Scrum methodology for goals.

BA.TITLE: Briseño Avalúos
BA.DESCRIPTION: Landing page designed in Figma and implemented with pure HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

SIMTEC.TITLE: SIMTEC
SIMTEC.DESCRIPTION: Web application for school management, created with Vue and Express.

MANGODB.TITLE: MangoDB
MANGODB.DESCRIPTION: Final project: a web application for crop management in an agricultural company. Developed in Ruby on Rails, using MVC, PostgreSQL, and SCSS.

ALURAGEEK.TITLE: AluraGeek
ALURAGEEK.DESCRIPTION: This is a simple React application for product management, allowing users to add, display, and delete products.

ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT_ME.SUBTITLE: A Small Fragment About Me
ABOUT_ME.DESCRIPTION: I have experience in frontend software development and a strong interest in UX/UI design. My goal is to apply my skills in a professional environment to contribute to creating intuitive and visually appealing interfaces, always striving to develop innovative solutions. I enjoy collaborating in teams and am motivated by the challenge of improving user experiences through design and technology. Additionally, I enjoy spending time with friends, savoring good coffee, and listening to music.
